page.title: 18Traffic in Banbury
page.content: The main way to travel in Banbury is by car.In Banbury we have one multi-storey car park, two other large car parks and lots of small places to park along the side of road. We do have a lot of traffic jams especially around the cross, the traffic lights at the junction of Warwick Rd, Southam Rd,Castle St and North Bar and on the railway bridge from Grimsbury. We have one bus station where you can catch buses to another part of Banbury or to another town. There are bus stops dotted all around the town so that people can get from the town centre to the housing estates. We also have one railway station from which trains often travel to Oxford, London, Birmingham and other places.
